header_text: You are eating a cup of soup. Your arms move suddenly, and you accidentally spill some of the soup on your lap. As you wonder if anyone will notice the spill, you become anxious.

elements.text: You go to the bathroom to try to get the mess off of your pants. As you realize the stain is coming off easily, you feel...

elements.name: You are eating a cup of soup. Your arms move suddenly, and you accidentally spill some of the soup on your lap. As you wonder if anyone will notice the spill, you become anxious._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle_word2
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
